snippet: The Municipal Art Society plans to give its Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis Medal to Bruce C. Ratner, builder of the Atlantic Yards development.
abstract: Municipal Art Society plans to give its Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis Medal to Bruce C Ratner, builder of the Atlantic Yards development in Brooklyn; plan comes under attack by activists and city preservationists who say Ratner's organization is more bulldozer than builder.
lead_paragraph: The Municipal Art Society plans to give its Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis Medal to Bruce C. Ratner, builder of the Atlantic Yards development.

headline.main: Plan to Honor Big Developer in Brooklyn Is Criticized
headline.print_headline: Plan to Honor Big Developer in Brooklyn Is Criticized
